bindings.name: users
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT c.id, c.isPublic FROM c WHERE c.id = {id}

bindings.name: radars
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT c.playStyle, MAX(c.radar.stream) AS stream, MAX(c.radar.voltage) AS voltage, MAX(c.radar.air) AS air, MAX(c.radar.freeze) AS freeze, MAX(c.radar.chaos) AS chaos FROM c WHERE c.userId = {id} AND IS_DEFINED(c.radar) AND ((NOT IS_DEFINED(c.ttl)) OR c.ttl = -1 OR c.ttl = null) GROUP BY c.playStyle
